forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the sky is painted with the fading light of a mostly sunny afternoon. The warmth of a high near sixty has gently ebbed into the cool embrace of early evening, while the soft whisper of a west-southwest breeze lingers, hinting at the night to come. Presently, the horizon is cloaked in clouds, an omen of the rain that will make its presence felt after 11 PM. The streets still hum with life, illuminated by the glow of city lights, complemented by a promising drizzle that is anticipated to tease the urban landscape with its soft touch.

As the temperature dips to around fifty-one, one might consider wrapping themselves in layers—a light sweater perhaps, with a jacket at hand to combat the cool night air. With the rain looming and humidity in the forecast, a walk through the city’s winding streets could be invigorating yet serene. The allure of a cozy café beckons, promising warmth and solace against the rhythmic patter of anticipated raindrops. Whether it's a stroll to enjoy the fleeting warmth before night falls or a moment spent savoring the ambiance indoors, tonight holds simple pleasures beneath a canopy of shifting clouds.
